review.reviewBody: Pizza has been delivered hot and fresh.

Normally love their pizza. Tried adding wings this time and some of them are the size of my pinky finger. Not only that but they are completely flavorless (certainly not hot wings as ordered), extremely disappointing.
an amazing pizza and crust was cooked to perfection...was 1st time ordering and won't be the last.  I have never been a big fan of pizza until today
the 4. Pepperoni (Medium) is soooooo good, the amount of sauce? PERFECT! amazing amount of pepperonis on each slice
Always absolutely AMAZING 👏 ❤️  love this place so much! Employees are always above and beyond to their clients 🤗
